title: One node secure deploy
description:
The task is to implement ansible role that deploys a single elasticsearch node with basic security settings as described here: https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/7.17/configuring-stack-security.html ?blade=kibanasecuritymessage

To do this, it is proposed to put everything related to the deployment of elasticsearch in a separate role from existing playbook.

It is also necessary to add role testing using ansible molecule.
